about_the_game:
When The Devil himself approaches you with an opportunity you cannot refuse a journey into your most perverse fetishes starts!

The game features six amazing chapters for you to enjoy!

Play six erotic stories, each about 10k words long

  • "The Massage" features 18 different endings to unlock
  • "Working Friend" features 10 different endings to unlock
  • "The Guest" features 5 different endings to unlock
  • "Dream Girl" features 4 different endings to unlock
  • "Rookie girl" feature 6 different endings to unlock
  • "Hot tub" features 7 different endings to unlock

Customize your name and the name of your love interest

"The Massage" and "Working Friend" feature a M/F relationship, "The Guest" features a M/M relationship other stories will feature even M/F/F relationships

content_descriptors.notes: Full frontal nudity, sexual intercourse, explicit language, explicit sexual interaction

Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System
